forWho.title: Is this for you?
forWho.description: Local Growth is designed for businesses that serve specific geographic areas and depend on local customers finding them.

problem.title: The problem
problem.description: Your business is invisible in Google Maps. When potential customers search for your services, competitors appear instead—even if you've been operating longer and deliver better work. Your Google Business Profile is incomplete, your citations are inconsistent, and you have no strategy for reviews.

solution.title: Our approach
solution.description: We systematically build your local visibility through three layers: optimizing your Google Business Profile, establishing citation consistency across directories, and implementing ongoing authority building. This isn't a one-time fix—it's infrastructure that compounds.

timeline.title: Timeline & expectations
timeline.description: Initial improvements visible within 4-8 weeks. Significant ranking changes typically take 3-6 months. Local SEO is a long-term investment—we build infrastructure that compounds over time, not quick fixes that fade.

faq.question: Do you guarantee #1 rankings?
faq.answer: No. Anyone who guarantees specific rankings is lying. We guarantee systematic work and measurable improvement, but rankings depend on factors no one can control.

faq.question: How do you handle multiple locations?
faq.answer: Each location gets individual attention—separate GBP optimization, location-specific citations, and distinct tracking. Pricing scales accordingly.

faq.question: What if I have NAP inconsistencies?
faq.answer: That's normal and fixable. We audit all existing citations and systematically correct inconsistencies as part of the process.

faq.question: Do you handle review responses?
faq.answer: We can, but we recommend you do. Your voice is more authentic. We provide templates and coaching for effective review responses.
